unit.data.corruptor.name: Corruptor
unit.data.corruptor.lore: Alchemists basking in decomposed Mana vapors giving them unique abilities to corrode and corrupt Metal and Spirit.
unit.data.corruptor.combo.0: Range Attack1. Other Followers get +1 to their Attacks
unit.data.corruptor.description.visuals: Large metallic suit of armor, covering the body fully like a metal hazmat suit. Metallic tubes coming in an out of the armor with some grey liquid spilling out of the joints. The suit has a purple faceplate but it's unclear whether the creature inside is still human anymore. The creature is holding multiple flasks of pink corrosive liquid. A magnetic aura is emanating from the suit.
